# 3S-SOFT (https://3s-soft.com)

> A premium digital engineering and growth agency. 3S-SOFT specializes in scalable MERN stack development, comprehensive eCommerce managed services (Amazon, eBay, etc.), and advanced SEO strategies for US and UK markets.

## Agency Vision
To empower businesses by bridging the gap between innovative code and measurable digital growth. We don't just build websites; we engineer business solutions.

## Service Portfolio (TL;DR)
- **Software Engineering**: Full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express, React 19, Node.js).
- **Global eCommerce**: Advanced store management and product optimization for Amazon, eBay, Walmart, and Etsy.
- **Organic Growth**: Technical SEO, content strategy, and data-driven lead generation.
- **Operations Support**: Trained Virtual Assistants for startup administrative and technical efficiency.
